SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Interface TranslatorExtension<D extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseHasExtensions,E extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseExtension<E,?>,C extends FDSConfig & ExtensionProcessor<E>>

Type Parameters:
D - the type of data to be translated
E - the type of extension field to be translated
C - the type of config supporting the extension processing
All Superinterfaces:
Translator<D>
public interface TranslatorExtension<D extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseHasExtensions,E extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseExtension<E,?>,C extends FDSConfig & ExtensionProcessor<E>> extends Translator<D>
Interface for translators that specifically handle dosage objects with "extension" elements. This class extends Translator to provide additional reusable code for "extension"
Since:
2.1.5
Author:
jy95
